entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
